mapper.select:
select
from t_personal_treasuryctrl a where a.t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlID = #{t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_personal_treasuryctrl a where 1=1
and a.t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlProdName like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlProdName},'%')
and a.t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlProdPID like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlProdPID},'%')
and a.t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlProdSerList like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlProdSerList},'%')
and a.t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlPersonalCatList like CONCAT('%',#{t_personalewallet_treasuryctrlPersonalCatList},'%')
and a.create_time like CONCAT('%',DATE(#{create_time}),'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by a.create_time
